item.title: Several FTAs up for early signing to facilitate trade
item.description: Negotiations for inking free-trade agreements (FTAs) with a number of countries are ripe, officials say, while deal-feasibility studies with scores of others get underway. The ministry is planning to begin feasibility study soon aiming to sign FTA with Turkey and Nigeria, among others, they added.
